id.description: The unique identifier of the DID pool.

name.description: The name or title assigned to the DID pool.

division.description: Information about the division to which the DID pool belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the division.

selfUri.description: The URI for accessing more details about the division.

descriptions.description: Any detailed descriptions or information provided for the DID pool data.

version.description: The version number of the DID pool entry.

dateCreated.description: The date and time when the DID pool entry was created.

dateModified.description: The date and time when the DID pool entry was last modified.

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified this DID pool entry.

createdBy.description: The user who originally created this DID pool entry.

state.description: The current state or status of the DID pool.

modifiedByApp.description: The application through which the DID pool entry was last modified.

createdByApp.description: The application through which the DID pool entry was created.

startPhoneNumber.description: The starting phone number range of the DID pool.

endPhoneNumber.description: The ending phone number range of the DID pool.

comments.description: Any additional comments or notes related to the DID pool data.

provider.description: Information about the telephony provider associated with the DID pool.

selfUri.description: The URI for accessing more details about the DID pool.
